title: Senior Software Engineer

achievements: Built scalable contact database infrastructure handling 50M+ contact records with sub-second query performance, improving contact search and segmentation speed by 70%

title: Senior Software Engineer

achievements: Delivered a scalable, production-ready system from scratch in under 4 months, reducing prescription and note-writing time by 40–50%
Managed and mentored a team of 3 developers, driving clean architecture, fast release cycles, and collaborative workflows

title: Co Founder & CTO

achievements: Designed a robust multi-tenant cloud architecture with deep linking, product versioning, role-based access, and automation
Integrated payments (Cashfree, PhonePe), marketing automation, and SEO-optimized Markdown content workflows

title: Member of Technical Staff
